abstract: Cairo court acquits Habib el-Adly, former Pres Hosni Mubarak's longtime interior minister, of last of several criminal charges that have kept him jailed.
lead_paragraph: The acquittal of Habib el-Adly is the latest in a string of rulings in favor of former officials jailed after the Arab Spring uprising.

headline.seo: Court in Egypt Clears a Mubarak Official

snippet: The acquittal of Habib el-Adly is the latest in a string of rulings in favor of former officials jailed after the Arab Spring uprising.
